CustomField.description: The amount of backlog (bookings - billings) that was made inactive when the project (and/or sub-projects) became inactive. For parent projects, this is a cumulative value. NOTE: this field is only intended to be updated by PSE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of backlog (bookings - billings) that was made inactive when the project (and/or sub-projects) became inactive. For parent projects, this is a cumulative value. NOTE: this field is only intended to be updated by PSE.
CustomField.label: Inactive Project Backlog
